work.title: Data Engineer Intern
description: Developed and managed a high-influx data pipeline using Python and NLP processing techniques
Utilized natural language processing to extract relevant insights from large datasets
Implemented data processing and storage solutions to handle high-volume data streams
Collaborated with the team to design and implement efficient data pipelines
Developed modules for data preprocessing, feature extraction, and model training

work.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
description: Developing AI/ML solutions for Government Pilot projects
Engineered a license plate recognition and record-keeping prototype model
Improved accuracy from 87% to 94.7%, decreased average time from 14 seconds to under 1 second
Developing modules for anomaly detection, helmet detection, and event monitoring
Collaborating with Vadodara police for deployment across Toll Plazas

work.title: AI/ML intern
description: Gained hands-on experience with data analysis and machine learning techniques

education.title: B.Tech. - CSE - Artificial Intelligence - PIET

achievements: Active participant in AI/ML research projects
